arts.ttl: Ernest Poku grabs Bayer Leverkusen winner at St. Pauli
arts.sum: Substitute Ernest Poku sealed a narrow win for Bayer Leverkusen over St. Pauli following earlier strikes from Edmond Tapsoba and Hauke Wahl. Just two minutes later, Grimaldo found Poku with a precise pass, and the Dutch forward finished coolly past Vasilj to restore Leverkusen's lead with his very first touch in the match.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: St. Pauli vs. Bayer Leverkusen

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Bayer Leverkusen preview: Can Hjulmand extend unbeaten start?
arts.sum: Kasper Hjulmand will be looking to extend his unbeaten start as Bayer Leverkusen boss when his team take on St. Pauli on Saturday.

arts.ttl: "We still have hope" – Hjulmand gives update on Tella ahead of St. Pauli clash
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen are hopeful that Nathan Tella can make his return from injury against St. Pauli at the weekend.
